name: RTCRtpEncodingParameters.maxBitrate
description: The RTCRtpEncodingParameters dictionary's maxBitrate property specifies the maximum number of bits per second to allow a track encoded with this encoding to use.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
